title: Situated Learning-Based Online Course for Project Management Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental work processes and digital literacy
context.additional_context: An online collaborative learning environment based on project scenarios that may occur in the workplace. Focuses on strengthening practical competencies as professionals share work experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world project cases to derive at least three core risk factors.
Learners can use the LMS discussion feature to create peer feedback-based project proposals.
Learners can develop resource allocation and scheduling strategies through context-specific simulation modules.

resources: LMS platform (discussion board, document sharing, video lecture functionality)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
